description: This table indicates whether the hospice diagnoses at the time of the completed plan of care were hospice related.

columns.name: POC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the plan of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HOSPICE_RELATED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether the hospice diagnoses at the time of the completed plan of care were hospice related.


May contain organization-specific values: No
